title: Joint Placement Head
description: Leading placement initiatives and industry partnerships for 800+ students at Punjab Engineering College. Driving strategic outreach, managing placement data and analytics, and building Excel and Power BI dashboards to support planning and decision-making.

achievements.text: Driving outreach and industry/alumni networking to expand internship and placement opportunities
Managing placement data and insights for strategic planning
Building Excel and Power BI dashboards for placement analytics and reporting

title: Management Head
description: Led strategic planning, fundraising, and cross-department collaboration for PEC's Mars Rover Project under the NASA Human Exploration Rover Challenge. Secured significant funding and managed national-level project execution.

achievements.text: Raised funding for PEC's Mars Rover Project
Led strategic planning and sponsor outreach for national-level competition
Coordinated cross-department collaboration involving technical, design, and operations teams

title: Executive Member
description: Orchestrated robotics competitions and AI technical sessions while mentoring junior students in robotics, AI strategy, and project execution. Managed technical and cultural events for the college community.

achievements.text: Orchestrated robotics competitions and AI technical sessions
Mentored junior students in robotics, AI strategy, and project execution
Coordinated technical and cultural events as event coordinator
